Draft Rating:

C

Carroll Dawson ranks in the 51th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Dawson's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 2 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Cuttino Mobley with 41th pick but was worth 27th pick.
  • Drafted Luther Head with 24th pick but was worth 12th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Kenny Thomas with 22th pick but was worth 46th pick.
  • Drafted Bryce Drew with 16th pick but was worth 45th pick.
  • Drafted Michael Dickerson with 14th pick but was worth 36th pick.

Trade Rating:

A+

Carroll Dawson ranks in the 95th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Don MacLean, Jason Collins, Steve Francis, Tony Massenburg to HOU.
  • Lost Antoine Carr, Michael Dickerson, Othella Harrington, Brent Price, Marcus Banks to VAN.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Stacey Augmon, Kelvin Cato, Ed Gray, Carlos Rogers, Brian Shaw, Walt Williams to HOU.
  • Lost Scottie Pippen to POR.

Signing Rating:

D+

Carroll Dawson ranks in the 39th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Chuck Hayes in 2006.
  • Signed Bob Sura in 2004.
  • Signed Jim Jackson in 2003.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Maurice Taylor in 2000.
  • Signed Moochie Norris in 2000.
  • Signed Matt Maloney in 1996.
